solution.text:
Observe the pie chart carefully,
the students spends \(10\) percent of the total amount on batteries.
Central angle = \(\frac{10}{100} \times 360\)
\(=_{{(Decimal(str(0.1)))*360}}_\)
Therefore, central angle of the sector for batteries is \(=_{{(Decimal(str(0.1)))*360}}_\) degrees

content.text:
He was given Rs.\(_{j}_\) from his parents and he managed to save Rs.\(_{{(Decimal(str(0.15)))*j}}_\) from the total amount.
What is the central angle of the sector for batteries?
